channel.title: Articles on DwarfPets em Português
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on DwarfPets em Português

item.title: Periquito
item.description: A parakeet is able to make a lot of different sounds. While they can’t use words to talk with us, these sounds allow them to communicate in ways that many owners can understand once they keep the pet around for a little bit.

item.title: Por que meu periquito se apoia em apenas uma perna
item.description: Parakeets are a bird that come to us from Australia. These birds can make great pets to keep in your home and really like it when they can interact with others around them.

item.title: Por que meu periquito está estalando o seu bico
item.description: Seu periquito estala o bico porque é um filho da puta arrobando sua anta analfabeta.
